DataElement.preferredName: Patient Blood Pressure Measurement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response that indicates whether a patient meets the criteria for participation in a clinical trial regarding blood pressure measurements.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Blood Pressure Measurement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The pressure of the circulating blood against the walls of the blood vessels._Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Blood Pressure Measurement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: The pressure of the circulating blood against the walls of the blood vessels.:Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The pressure of the circulating blood against the walls of the blood vessels.
Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is patient willing to check b
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient willing to check blood pressure daily?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient willing and able to check and record daily blood pressure readings?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is receiving cediranib, is patient willing and able to check and record daily blood pressure readings?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient able and willing to check and record daily blood pressure readings?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient willing and able to check and record daily blood pressure readings, when randomized to the cediranib containing arm?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is randomized to the cediranib arm, is patient willing and able to check and record daily blood pressure readings?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have blood pressure (BP) no greater than 140 mmHg (systolic) and 90 mmHg (diastolic)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have baseline blood pressure (BP) lower than 140 mmHg (systolic) and 90 mmHg (diastolic)?
